content:
Hello everyone!
I have opened a PR to add saturating methods to Duration: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/76114
If anyone has some feedback that would be greatly appreciated :+1:
This overall looks fine to me, and I think I could probably r+ it since it will be unstable. Any t-libs member want to double check that it wouldn't introduce something insta-stable?

Looks like it's just functions and constants, so should be fine? I thought it was only trait impls that could backdoor stabilize things (either the impl itself, or by allowing access to unstable types like NoneError via Try).
I've created a tracking issue https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76416 and updated the code. It should be ready for another pass of review :+1:
Hello! Its me again :P Could anyone take a look at those 3 nice new methods I want to add to Duration? That would be super nice!
@marmeladema Please wait for @Jake Goulding to review it again, maybe he/she is busy.
Thank you both for reviewing :+1: I just saw its been merged :tada:
@marmeladema Thanks for sending the patch. :D
